name: MANAFX
body:
### Welcome to MANAFX
Open source web application framework powered by Phalcon, a full-stack PHP framework delivered as a C-extension.
It's innovative architecture makes Phalcon the fastest PHP framework ever built! [See for yourself... ](http://docs.phalconphp.com/)

### Designed for developer, everywhere.
Manafx makes web application development faster and easier. It's made for folks of all skill levels, application of all types, and projects of all sizes.

### There are no limits!
From simple to sophisticated, Manafx has the flexibility to power all sorts of web application. Flexible content structure and powerful templating allow easy realization of any design.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
